page.title: 06TOURISM
page.content: Some camping at Gillywartha. Self_catering at Gillan, Flushing, St. Anthony,MANACCAN & Helford. {Tregildry Hotel}_ built 55 years ago (1931).Open Easter_October. Can sleep 25 and seat 50 to dine. The "New Inn" in Manaccan provides good pub' food, as does the "Shipwright's Inn" at Helford also provides food. Some houses do bed and breakfast accommodation. {Attractions}_ swimming,sailing,riding, wind surfing,fishing and walking. There are cliff and river walks, through woods and across open country. Bosahan Gardens are open on occasions during the summer. There are trees, shrubs, and many tropical and exotic plants.
